content: markers are wrapped you should have 9 10 11 12 13 wrapped sts on each side of your centre third stitches do not remove your stitch markers do not turn your work after the last wrapping on rs instead continue by working two full rounds of the sock n1 and n2 while picking up the wraps and knitting them together with their corresponding stitches end your last round normally when reaching your bor 5 camilleromano com uni socks boomerang heel part 2 decrease round n1 k1 ssk k to 3 sts bef end of n1 k2tog k1 n2 k1 ssk k to 3 sts bef end of n2 k2tog k1 the second part of the heel is also worked back and forth on n1 sts only work 1 round without decreases short row 1 rs k to m sm k to m sm w&t decrease round n1 k1 ssk k to 3 sts bef end of n1 k2tog k1 short row 2 ws sm p to m sm w&t n2 k1 ssk k to 3 sts bef end of n2 k2tog k1 short row 3 rs sm k to m sm k to previous w&t and knit it with its wrap w&t work 1 round without decreases short row 4 ws p to m sm p to m sm p to previous w&t and p it with its wrap w&t decrease round n1 k1 ssk k to 3 sts bef end of n1 k2tog k1 n2 k1 ssk k to 3 sts bef end of n2 k2tog k1 short row 5 rs k to m sm k to m sm k to previous w&t and k it with its wrap w&t work 1 round without decreases short row 6 ws p to m sm p to m sm p to previous w&t and p it with its wrap w&t next work the decrease round on every round until you can t decrease as est anymore repeat these last two row until all the stitches on each side of the markers have been wrapped you should have ended close the toe box by grafting the remaining stitches using the with a ws row kitchener stitch see stitch patterns section for tutorial next row rs k across n1 removing markers on n1 as you knit the second sock identically encounter them and working any w&t st that s left k across n2 weave in the ends and block flat note keep half of your stitches on n1 and half on n2 as you have been doing so far foot it would be great to see your uni socks on ravelry or instagram note your stitch count has not changed from your when you post on instagram tag @ca- co edge millejulieromano and use the #unisocks hashtag continue working in the round in stockinette until the foot note this pattern is for personal use part measures approx 4 5 5 5 5 5 5 5 cm / 1 75 2 2 only copy
